hero.title: Administrative system for schools
hero.description: Program designed in Spanish and English with a sophisticated security system for access control. This administrative system facilitates administrative tasks, increasing efficiency and providing more time to focus on the supervision phase of educational processes.

item1.title: Implementation Service
item1.description: This includes coordination for training stages with implementation dates. Material (manuals, etc.) for staff training. Follow-up to ensure the tasks required to complete the implementation of the SchoolSoft system are carried out for the benefit of the institution.

item2.title: Regiweb
item2.description: The new all-internet service, complete teacher registration, parents can view their children's grades, manage all accounts, and much more.

item3.title: Technical Support
item3.description: Individual technical assistance for administrative and teaching staff, by phone, internet, or remote control. All these technical support access options are available according to the needs and facilities available at the institution.

item4.title: Repair Service
item4.description: Parts and service for school equipment installed by our company.

item5.title: Laboratory Rental
item5.description: Offer your students a modern lab with all applications such as Office 2018, class control, educational programs, antivirus, Windows 10, Windows Server 2018, among other options. Call us, and we will improve any written offer.

items.item2: Sale of Computers and all types of accessories.

item1.title: Student Information
item1.description: Student records, parent, guardian, teachers, vaccines, illnesses, disabilities, re-enrollment, homeroom, data control, indexes, record search, socioeconomic, medical, totals by grade, account lists, address reports, phone lists, work lists, parent lists, new student report, discount lists, labels, certified letters, and a variety of reports.

item2.title: Grading System
item2.description: Course catalog, subjects, special programs, entry of grades and behaviors by trimester, teacher records, calculation of trimester and semester grades, merits, demerits, failures, rankings, trimester averages, summer grades, report cards, comment section for report cards, messages for report cards, class schedule, grade distribution, grade records, cumulative data, and a variety of reports.

item3.title: Electronic Record
item3.description: Entry of daily work grades, projects, notebook work, exams, trimester behaviors, trimester, semester, and final averages, trimester attendance, daily plans, and a variety of reports.

item4.title: Accounts Receivable
item4.description: Budgeting, costs, discounts, payment screen, surcharges, payment booklet, debtor list, account statements, daily payments, creation of various collection letters, 30-60-90 reports, receipts, and a variety of reports.

item5.title: Church System
item5.description: Certificates for Marriage, Baptism, Communion, Negative, Confirmation, and Notification, etc.

item1.title: Regiweb
item1.description: Includes grade entry, allowing teachers to input various types of grades such as exams, quizzes, daily work, notebook assignments, attendance, behavior, and send homework. Teachers can communicate with parents via web, mobile, or email and print various reports.

item2.title: Parent Module
item2.description: Parents can view their children's grades, communicate with teachers via web or email, update their information, enable or disable email notifications, and request appointments with teachers.

item3.title: Administration
item3.description: The school can manage modules, general school information, trimester start and end dates, import and export data, activate and deactivate users, send messages via web, mobile, or email, and generate a variety of reports.

item4.title: Event Calendar
item4.description: Allows adding activities scheduled throughout the year. Anyone can view the calendar, but only the administrator or authorized person can add, modify, or delete events. These modules include maintenance for updates and institution-requested changes.
